description: This file provides utility functions for splitting a string into tokens and storing them in a linked list. It includes methods to parse a string by spaces and validate tokens before adding them to the list.

classes.name: SplitUtils
classes.description: An object containing utility functions to split strings into tokens and manage them within linked lists.

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits a string into tokens based on spaces and stores valid tokens in a linked list.

methods.name: addIfValid
methods.description: Checks if a token is valid and adds it to the provided linked list if valid.

methods.name: isTokenValid
methods.description: Validates whether a token string is not empty.
